title: Bosch 1617EVSPK Wood Router Tool Combo Kit - Precision and Power
description: The Bosch 1617EVSPK Wood Router Tool Combo Kit delivers precision and power for all your woodworking needs. This kit features a powerful 2.25 HP motor with variable speed settings ranging from 8,000 to 25,000 RPM, allowing you to tackle a variety of applications with ease. The combo kit includes both fixed and plunge bases, giving you the flexibility to handle a range of routing tasks. The precision centering design ensures accurate bit alignment, while the durable aluminum construction provides longevity and durability. Whether you're creating decorative edges, dadoes, or mortises, this router kit is the perfect addition to your woodworking toolkit.
meta_title: Bosch 1617EVSPK Wood Router Tool Combo Kit - Precision and Power
meta_description: Shop the Bosch 1617EVSPK Wood Router Tool Combo Kit, offering precision and power with a 2.25 HP motor, variable speed, and durable construction. Perfect for woodworking projects.

title: Bosch 1617EVSPK Wood Router Tool Combo Kit - Versatile and Durable
description: The Bosch 1617EVSPK Wood Router Tool Combo Kit is a versatile and durable solution for all your woodworking projects. With a powerful 2.25 HP motor and variable speed settings from 8,000 to 25,000 RPM, this router kit allows you to handle a wide range of tasks with precision and control. The kit includes both fixed and plunge bases, providing the flexibility to tackle various routing applications. The precision centering design ensures accurate bit alignment, while the aluminum construction guarantees durability and long-lasting performance. Ideal for creating intricate designs, edges, and joints, this router kit is a must-have for any woodworking enthusiast.
